html:
Episode 141 Guest: Tytus Kurek

25 May 2020 |

In this episode we talk about OpenStack with Tytus Kurek

Comments

Please leave a comment, positive, negative or just something weird.

Tytus Kurek

Tytus is a Product Manager at Canonical – the publishers of popular operating system Ubuntu.

He is responsible for developing and maintaining product roadmaps for OpenStack and Kubernetes. Tytus has been working in the IT industry for 10 years, leading complex projects involving numerous cutting-edge technologies: NFV, OpenStack, Kubernetes and others.

Guest Episodes:

  • Episode 141 - OpenStack
